name: [ANDROID] Desert Prince Adventure: Raja Castle
description:
Deathrun parkour adventure into the Middle Eastern Palace. Go through the 7 levels to gain Raja's gold! Run, Jump, Avoid dangerous traps and kill evil minions. 

- 7 Unique Levels For Parkour 
- Sacred Middle East Atmosphere and Great Graphics
- Lots of Enemies
- 2 Mighty Bosses
- Basic Weapon and Magic For Use
- Great Moments and Places For BunnyHop and SpeedRun
